content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.(Here is an example: [{'role': 'user', 'content': 'You have been given a circular path consisting of 20 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a Chow Chow. Moving in a clockwise direction from the Chow Chow, the elements on the path are a strainer, a white-headed capuchin, a disc brake, a cougar, a croquet ball, a pencil case, a hot dog, a Shetland Sheepdog, a gyromitra, a microphone, a lion, a scoreboard, an analog clock, a barometer, an alligator lizard, a ping-pong ball, a high-speed train, a thimble, and a cuirass. Starting from the lion, you move around the ring by 17 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 8 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 8 steps in a clockwise direction. What will you find?'}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content': 'Cuirass'}, {'role': 'user', 'content': 'You have been given a circular path consisting of 20 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a Chow Chow. Moving in a clockwise direction from the Chow Chow, the elements on the path are a strainer, a white-headed capuchin, a disc brake, a cougar, a croquet ball, a pencil case, a hot dog, a Shetland Sheepdog, a gyromitra, a microphone, a lion, a scoreboard, an analog clock, a barometer, an alligator lizard, a ping-pong ball, a high-speed train, a thimble, and a cuirass. Starting from the barometer, you move around the ring by 17 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 8 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 8 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. What will you find?'}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content': 'Croquet ball'}])

You have been given a circular path consisting of 20 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a library. Moving in a clockwise direction from the library, the elements on the path are a harvester, a dung beetle, a nipple, a Komodo dragon, a Rottweiler, a whiskey jug, a titi, a grey fox, a space heater, a thatched roof, a cicada, a paintbrush, a marmot, a split-rail fence, a beaver, a speaker, a bucket, a T-shirt, and a bridegroom. Starting from the Rottweiler, you move around the ring by 7 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 13 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. What will you find?
